title: Desire
description:
Amanda Egge and Nayland Blake share stories about reconciling their own desires with the desires of others.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Frank Lenz, Amanda Egge, The Yellow River Boys, Hogan Grip, Kevin Allison, Nayland Blake)
